name: Farmyard
description: Overgrown fields surround a dilapidated farmhouse. A broken fence encloses the property.

objects.name: Root Cellar
objects.description: A small underground storage area accessed by a wooden trapdoor.

objects.name: Stone Fireplace
objects.description: A well-built stone fireplace with a chimney. Cold ashes remain from old fires.

objects.name: Underground Pool
objects.description: A clear pool of water fed by underground springs. The water looks fresh and clean.
